ideas.title: AI CEOs transformed Davos into a tech conference
ideas.description: The World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos felt different this year, and not just because Meta and Salesforce took over storefronts on the main promenade. AI dominated the conversation in a way that overshadowed traditional topics like climate change and global poverty, and the CEOs weren’t holding back. There was public criticism of trade policy, warnings about AI […]
hooks: AI Took Over Davos: The Shocking Transformation
Tech CEOs Rewrite Global Power at Davos
Inside the AI Revolution Sweeping World Leaders

tips: Use archival footage of Davos mixed with current AI conference clips
Create dynamic lower-thirds with tech-inspired motion graphics
Include picture-in-picture interviews with AI experts and attendees

visualDirection.description: High-contrast blue and white color palette with metallic silver accents. Dynamic split-screen compositions mimicking data visualization. Futuristic sans-serif typography with angular cuts. Subtle holographic motion overlay. Clean, technological aesthetic with a sense of urgency and transformation.

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic montage of Davos 2024 AI presence
Context: Traditional economic forum vs. AI-dominated landscape
Key Players: Meta, Salesforce, and AI CEO perspectives
Global Impact: How AI is reshaping international discourse
Future Implications: Closing call to understand AI's potential

ideas.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
ideas.description: Sam Altman is set for his first India visit in nearly a year.
hooks: How AI Giants Navigate Global Tech Diplomacy
Decoding Sam Altman's Strategic India Playbook
AI Leadership: Behind the International Chessboard

tips: Use screen-split view showing map/timeline during geopolitical narrative
Incorporate animated infographics tracking AI leadership movements
Create chapter markers highlighting key strategic moments

visualDirection.description: Geopolitical tech aesthetic: Deep navy and electric blue color palette, dynamic geometric transitions, sleek sans-serif typography with technical overlay graphics, motion design emphasizing global connectivity and strategic mapping

exampleOutline: Introduction: Global AI Leadership Landscape
Context: Why India Matters for AI Development
Step-by-Step: Decoding Diplomatic Tech Strategies
Key Insights: Future of International AI Collaboration
Closing: Emerging Geopolitical Tech Trends

ideas.title: Only 1 week left (or until the first 500 passes are gone): The first TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket discount is ending
ideas.description: Register now to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 pass and get a second ticket at 50% off. This offer ends next week on January 30, or once the first 500 tickets are claimed — whichever comes first.
hooks: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026: Your Ticket Discount Ends Soon!
Save $680: Exclusive Disrupt Pass Opportunity Closing
500 Passes, 1 Week Left - Don't Miss Out!

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Use YouTube's countdown feature to create urgency
Prepare pre-written response templates for common Q&A questions

visualDirection.description: High-energy dynamic visual design with pulsing countdown timer overlay, tech-futuristic color palette of electric blue and graphite gray, animated ticket graphic with dynamic motion design elements, bold sans-serif typography with motion-tracked text animations, picture-in-picture style layout showcasing live presenter and ticket information simultaneously

exampleOutline: Section 1: High-Energy Live Stream Opening & Ticket Discount Reveal
Section 2: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 Context and Event Significance
Section 3: Detailed Breakdown of Ticket Discount Mechanics
Section 4: Exclusive Insights and Networking Opportunities
Section 5: Final Call-to-Action with Registration Instructions

ideas.title: Former Sequoia partner’s new startup uses AI to negotiate your calendar for you
ideas.description: Blockit, an AI agent that communicates directly with other calendars, has raised $5 million in seed funding led by Sequoia.
hooks: AI Now Schedules Your Meetings Better Than You
Your Personal AI Calendar Negotiator Has Arrived

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings showing Blockit in action
Create chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward design with electric blue and graphite color palette. Dynamic motion graphics showing calendar interactions. Clean, sans-serif typography with subtle geometric overlays. Animated flow charts demonstrating AI scheduling logic. Minimalist yet energetic visual style that communicates cutting-edge technology.

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic reveal of calendar scheduling problem
Problem: Current meeting scheduling inefficiencies
Solution: Blockit's AI negotiation mechanism
Technical Deep Dive: How the AI actually works
Future Implications & Call to Action
